lenders.name: Hector Lopez
lenders.occupation: is a hodgepodge of abstract functions.
lenders.loan_because: because I believe that we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Living in the United States has given me a life that most people dream about.  It is a life well funded by the union I have developed with my employer, my neighbors, and my family.  I hope to pass on this blessing to others.  I will publish a book of poetry in 2011 and will give all the proceeds to Kiva and my Kiva account.  I am not sure how much money the book will produce but it is worth a try.  Some of you have the resources and or talent to do more.  Please do.

lenders.name: moira
lenders.loan_because: i have always encouraged my 4 daughters to help others.To be able to help other women and their families become independent ..that's the best gift Ican think of
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with children and their families all my working life, both in the classroom setting and in a social welfare agency.The families I try to help have a multiplicity of problems...social , emotional,intellectual,and financial..Some are new immigrants and /or refugees..It's a challenging job..but I love it...I truly believe that I learn as much from them as they do from me

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: this is a great alternative to a one-time donation.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide financing to people wanting to buy a home.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: Make a difference :)
lenders.occupational_info: Work as a design consultant designing electronics and software.

lenders.name: Kary
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate investor, Broker, Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: Because the need is so great.  We all have to do something about it.   KIVA makes it so easy.  I get to know the people I am helping in some way by reading about their stories.  It is making a world of difference for them and for me, because I have been so fortunate, and want to give back!

lenders.name: Ganesh
lenders.loan_because:
I am thankful for the life God has
given me. I want to share part of my
well being with the needy.

lenders.name: Tom & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to support economic development (in a macro way) and help individuals developing their own livelihood (in a micro way).
lenders.occupational_info: Tom has worked in capital markets for most of his career; Elizabeth is in public relations, mostly in healthcare

lenders.name: jon
lenders.loan_because: I read "banker to the poor" and felt this was a more realistic and focused way of helping poeple.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick babies.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Chris, Teri & Kennedy
lenders.loan_because: I have so much money I don't know what to do with it. I'm RICH!
lenders.occupational_info: It doesn't matter what I do for work.  The fact is, I'm good at keeping my family together.  The other stuff doesn't really matter.  I do what i do for them.  Plain and simple.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other mothers creat a better life for all of our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with doctors to help find new medicines for diseases.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: by the grace of God, life has been good to me.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: my mother raised our family of 7 children by herself, and I want to help other women in her situation

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: To help people maintain their livelihoods.
lenders.occupational_info: Retail / Commercial / Mixed-Use development.

lenders.name: Larry & Stefi Johnson
lenders.loan_because:
We wish to give all people a chance to be what they dream to be...
No one should be denied the chance and this is a wonderful way to work together to accomplish that idea...
lenders.occupational_info: Semi-retired, but spend my time writing and finding ways to help others. Stefi is a linguist with 7 languages and works in the medical field.

lenders.name: Crush Groove Cosmetics
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower female entrepreneurs in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Crush Groove Cosmetics is an organic based makeup and skincare line in New York City.

lenders.name: Kaleisia
lenders.occupational_info: Creating a tea community that cares for all being around the globe.

lenders.name: Silk
lenders.loan_because: I care!  I think this is a fabulous move towards ending poverty. :)  I look forward to seeing lives changed. :)
lenders.occupational_info: Canadian girl who wants to see good people get a hand up in the world! :)

lenders.name: Concepts Consulting
lenders.loan_because: Giving time and material resources is part of a culture of community. Concepts Consulting Group is committed to giving locally and globally.
lenders.occupational_info: Concepts Consulting Group cultivates environments for organizational reflection and decision making through processes that encourage creative thinking and collaboration, define effective action and plan for sustainable results.

lenders.name: Ru
lenders.loan_because:
I've seen and met angels wearing the disguise of ordinary people living ordinary lives.  
~ Tracy Chapman


* Act as if what you do makes a difference.  It does.  
~ William James
lenders.occupational_info: Shutter-buggy, memoir-wrangling, computer-geek mother; life lover.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving others the means to support themselves rather than simply a one-time handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a church.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I'v been lucky in life and I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make better business decisions by providing accurate information.

lenders.name: Liesel
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little help sometimes.

lenders.name: corbett
lenders.loan_because: It gives me great inner peace knowing  I have helped others make a better life for their self and familys

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: My godfather doesn't want that my birth money will lay on a bank account until I am 18 years old.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a baby boy, so not much work to do so far ...

lenders.name: Bjoern V. Karlsen
lenders.loan_because: I am glad to be able to reach out to other hard working people. Reading about projects and people give me a better insight and understanding of how people are dealing with life in other parts of our planet, which I believe is valuable lessons for most people in my part of the world.

lenders.name: Girasolereale
lenders.loan_because: We fell that  loan can help to develop the idea and the work and maeby with our help they can start a good business and in the future loan to someone themself. It is like a big family chain ! GRAZIE
lenders.occupational_info: We have a bed and breakfast in Rome where we live and there I have my Home artGallery where I paint, do my artcraft and restore antique objects.

lenders.name: Arli
lenders.loan_because: I'm turning 2 years old today and it's better to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involved a lot of playing, running around, learning, and napping.

lenders.name: Elina
lenders.loan_because:
"The World is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing."
- Albert Einstein

lenders.name: Luke R
lenders.loan_because:
"I have the audacity to believe that people everywhere can have three meals a day for their bodies, education and culture for their minds, and dignity, quality, and freedom for their spirits. I believe that what self-centered men have torn down, other-centered men can build up."
- - Martin Luther King, Jr.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide legal representation to those accused of crimes.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: It is a privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: I brand and market financial services companies.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves and their families.  When my parents immigrated from China to the USA, my father worked as a waiter and my mother as a seamtress.  They worked hard and saved every cent possible while raising seven children.  With the help of  friends that loaned them small amounts of money, they were able to purchase a home.  I believe that a little bit can make a big change in many lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office for the railroad and make announcements and display signs when our trains are late.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: There are people out there that need this money a whole lot more than I do.

lenders.name: fiorella
lenders.loan_because: in qualche parte del mondo, abbiamo troppo, troppo poco per altri milioni di persone

lenders.name: Bernardine
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to show my gratitude for help given to me  and to help others improve their lives and futures.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: We want to assist those who work hard to better themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in the world should have the chance to support themselves and their family. We are very happy that in this small way  we can help make a difference. God Bless

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.occupational_info: I collect discarded medical equipment and supplies and give them away.

lenders.name: Marcos
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And it's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve God in any way that I can.

lenders.name: Jin
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: My Work: Making profitable short-term and long-term investments in various companies (public and private), assets and projects.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: i'm blessed, and it's best to spread that around a little.
lenders.occupational_info: i help groups of people work better together.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.occupational_info: Design and manufacture of products

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of microloaning and I particularly appreciate how Kiva tells me about each entrepreneur and allows me to select someone to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I write about creativity, innovation and "ideas so fresh... they should be slapped."

To me, Kiva is a fantastic example of a fresh idea, because it makes microlending approachable for everyone, and connects lenders with the people they're helping.

Plus, I love it because Kiva allows lenders to keep helping people by recycling their money to help new entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: if we all do our small parts, we can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year old childen.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I know that human beings, even in the direst of conditions, can do amazing things if given the chance, and I am thrilled to be that chance!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I have enough.
lenders.occupational_info: Lawyer representing low-income people and senior citizens in civil cases.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It works.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting those who wish to learn; babysitting those who do not.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at success.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people as they realize the opportunities they make for themselves. I believe that microfinancing goes farther than charity.

lenders.name: Emile
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes, we just need a break.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my store, my work is fun and I couldn't have done it without the support and help from my friends.  That's why I want to give back and keep the flow going.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: a small sum of money can make all the difference.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that I can directly help someone and positively effect their lives.  What a gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment business in television production, producing TV spots and programming.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to give back to the community, and to help those who need it the most.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach people who have lost their jobs due to downsizing.  I help provide training, teach and empower them how to interview, set employment goals, and assist in the development of their resumes and training.

lenders.name: Zena
lenders.loan_because: I am all for "when you get, give and when you learn, teach"
lenders.occupational_info: I have an Agency which provide Personal Care services for the Elderly.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am to live in the developed world.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I believe God has given those of us with more resources the responsibility and joy of being able to help and support those who have less.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their processes, and make their offices productive.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I respect and admire individuals who dare to pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Anna Maria
lenders.loan_because: I am a very blessed person, and I believe the more fortunate a person is, the more responsibility she has to give back to the world.  Also, I recognize and value the interconnectedness of people and their well-being on a global scale.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide administrative support to six financial analysts at an investment firm in New York City.

lenders.name: Robert Wafle
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is the most important part of our lives.

lenders.name: Angelica
lenders.loan_because: This is a great  opportunity to help people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Junior at Colorado State University and work as a waitress also.

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: My parents are teaching me to be caring and generous

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: No one gets by in this life alone.  We are all brothers and sisters, so what's a few dollars amongst family?
lenders.occupational_info: Attorney

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower individuals

lenders.name: Usama
lenders.loan_because: It's not mine anyway.
lenders.occupational_info: customer service

lenders.name: Leong/Allan Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe that helping people to be self-reliant is one of the best ways to support people in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info:
Nigel provides communications support to NGOs and help them to promote their work via the web and other communications channels.
Leslie is a photographer mostly focused on culture, landscape, people and wildlife. Her art endeavors focus on recycling, reusing and reclaiming materials.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in life.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: It's the absolute least I can do to help. : )
lenders.occupational_info: I create artwork for different companies to be used in books, games, and other things.

lenders.name: raju
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do for me.
lenders.occupational_info: love to support these kind of microfinance projects.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I'm a closet communist who believes in the power of capitalism
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school in Massachusetts and missing California.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so much in my life.  I want to take the gifts that he has given me and pass them on to those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I support computer applications.  I also work on computer hardware on the side (fixing PCs for individuals).

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: People everywhere deserve the opportunity to work for better lives and happier children.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for people

lenders.name: Nige and Rudie
lenders.loan_because: We travel quite a lot and it makes us realise how fortunate we are. Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to help give people a step up towards a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I market the English Language Teaching books of Cambridge University Press to English Language teachers in Asia.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is fundamental free enterprise capitalism at work.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people learn to read and think by discussing literature, plays, short stories, history, philosophy and science.  Join us in Northern California for a discussion; check our website and sign up for our free email newsletter.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I hope for the happiness of all people.
lenders.occupational_info: I put people to sleep so they do not feel the pain of surgery.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have always been interested in the concept of micro-lending. It makes me feel good to help a business get off the ground, and to see success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a Lawyer.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: People like me in the United States have many, many advantages.  As individuals, we need to share with the rest of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I do information technology consulting.  I am also a singer, songwriter and actor.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Social justice begins with small steps, like microfinance. I am especially interested in helping women around the world become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an administrator for a nonprofit domestic violence organization.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I was given the money as a birthday gift and I wanted to share it.

lenders.name: Rainbow Path
lenders.loan_because: This is our way of sharing our profits with our fellow human beings across the world.Peace!
lenders.occupational_info: A Bookstore for the new millenium!

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to start doing more to help people.  I think microfinance is a great idea and look forward to providing people across the world with more access to much needed capital.

lenders.name: Lynette
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: TU Wesley Foundation
lenders.loan_because: Because we can.

lenders.name: Read Books
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain a collection of books that elementary school aged children can borrow and read.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: the current system of advancing individual development is failing and does not reach down below the corruption and bureaucracy of existing governments.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to understand how development influences health and use this research to educate students and influence policies related to diet, health, and development.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because:
I loan through KIVA because I believe in their philosophy.  
It was an idea that was a long time coming.  Congrats KIVA !!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the television production industry.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and this is a great way to give back. Such a small amount of money can make a huge difference in the world, one entrepreneur at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I now spend my time helping young entrepreneurs start exciting new companies...

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in capitalism...and because I want to do what I can to make the world a better place

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: With finite funds for assisting people in need, I can help many more people by recycling my $ with loans than I can with charitable donations.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help support women around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Human Resources in workplace safety

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little of my world but means so much to their world.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: why wouldn't I?

lenders.name: Roseanna
lenders.loan_because: How can you not?

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am self-employed and love the idea of helping someone else to establish their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I find mortgage money for residential and commercial property purchases.

lenders.name: MaryK
lenders.loan_because:
I have lived in many third world
countries and know the situation.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with retired senior people
to enchance there quality of life.

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to improve their standard of living through hard work but without a place to start, that dream can be stifled.
lenders.occupational_info: I am most interested in designing buildings which make cities better places to live.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because:
“For it is in giving that we receive.”   St. Francis of Assisi 

"You make a living by what you get, but you make a life by what you give." Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: My life changed when I received a grant during my last semester of my college studies. I was able to become the woman I had only been able to dream about becoming. I hope to share a part of the generosity that was given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with survivors of family violence to find safety, healing and peace in their lives through local community groups and law enforcement. Now, I'm using those skills to raise my daughter and explore all that life has to offer.

lenders.name: Kaitlyn
lenders.occupation: international citizen sector org for social change
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to build a better life for themselves and their families

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help another become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist realtors with the paperwork it takes to sell or buy a home.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea and the way that it is set up.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial analysis

lenders.name: Shiv Shreya
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people

lenders.name: Fredrik
lenders.loan_because: I want to aid small business entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info:
There is now a similar system like KIVA but for businesses. After the financial crisis businesses in Sweden suffered a lot and it became much harder to borrow money. A new company and microloan system was developed to help companies get funding from private persons and other companies instead of banks. You can read more here:
http://www.momsens.se/vill-du-bli-en-bank-lana-ut-pengar-till-andra-foretag-utan-banker/

hence now there are KIVA-like systems for companies too!

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I think this site is a great tool to help people from al over the world, I hope the popularity grows.  People helping people thats what the world needs
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a manager at a new home building company

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: I hope it helps.
lenders.occupational_info:
I used to teach English to kids in Japan.
Then I made boring software.
Now I make more interesting software.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people live better lives.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the potential of microcredit to improve the lives of individuals. It is not the only solution to poverty, but it is a powerful tool.
lenders.occupational_info: It feels good to take a broken bike and make it whole again. It is a service I would like to promote in developing countries as well.

lenders.name: Annabelle and Mike
lenders.loan_because: We want to give people the opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We strive to help businesses become more conscious of the effects of their actions on people and the natural environment.

lenders.name: Chan
lenders.loan_because: To give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer technician for a large corporation.  I install and repair desktop pc's, printers and software.

lenders.name: Pallavi
lenders.loan_because: I think that people who want to work hard for a living deserve a chance. I am fortunate enough to pursue the future I want and I'd like to help others have the oppurtunity to do so as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a doctor. I'd like to be a pediatrician one day, but only time will tell. :)

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: 1. It's easy to do. 2. It's not charity.  3. It really helps people create wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer who tries to keep the government open and transparent.  Too many governmental decisions are made secretly and favor the few rather than the many.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.occupational_info: I sell real estate.

lenders.name: Tim and Callie
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is one of the most impactful ways I can improve the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families understand what they need to do to reach their financial goals.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: it is my choice.

lenders.name: Susan & Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: God has gifted us with enough to share with those less fortunate.  We are not only asked to share, we greatly enjoy it.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeremy sells welding equipment to produce everything from cars to buildings to ships.  Susan cares for our daughter Stella and for our home.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: "Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible."

lenders.name: weepstah
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers an alternative way to fund people trying to get ahead. Providing money via Kiva is much more satisfying then most other ways I spend it, and the majority of business people who apply for funding could really show the US (my home country) how to borrow and use money responsibly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology - supporting a variety of Data Warehousing software packages. Consider me a jack-of-many-trades - I work with a general understanding of how all the pieces fit together and apply that to specific projects and applications that use software that I have experience with.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise and know that working to improve our lives is the way to build a solid future.  I loan because I've been successful in part because of other's help and now I want to be the helper.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are demonstrating a desire to work hard to realize their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: We manage computer systems for many different companies around the world

lenders.name: The Shadowlight Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with abundance and, in gratitude, we pass that on.
lenders.occupational_info: We look for ways to make a difference in peoples lives.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help elderly people regain and maintain their mobility and independence.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I think life is pointless without sharing it with others and I extend this philosophy to economics. I loan to people who contribute to their communities and I choose microlenders based on the interest rate they charge.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an assistant registrar at a major university.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: This work is close to my heart & I can see the valuable contribution it's making.

lenders.name: Glenn & Jo
lenders.loan_because: The best way to promote capitalism as a system is to help to provide capital to entrepreneurs. The system has worked for us and we want to help others to get a leg up.

lenders.name: Karen & Ron
lenders.loan_because:
No one can do everything, but everyone can do something. 
We are thankful for what we have and want to help others create a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Karen is retired after 25 years of managing an international assignment and relocation program for her company.  Ron is retired from State Economic Development service and today helps others through his carpentry and construction skills.

lenders.name: Isa and Lucca
lenders.loan_because: I like to have lemonade stands.  And this week, I did my lemonade stand for Kiva.  I like helping people and animals.

lenders.name: Roxy
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe our reason for being on this earth...is to reach out to others....
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for a loving husband and three magnificent sons (and two beloved dogs) who are my gifts from God....

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: if you give, you begin to live.

lenders.name: MOSH Family
lenders.loan_because: To connect with people across the globe

lenders.name: Gary from Texas
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company selling aircraft internationally.  I also do some oil and gas work.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: 16 years ago I was a new mom, alone, unemployed, and suffering depression.  With a little help from my brother  I  was able to pull myself together.  I paid him back after I got on my feet even though he had given me the money as a gift and not a loan but I could never forgot how much his assistance had helped give me hope.   It was with much joy that I returned the money to him.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small office doing secretarial and bookkeeping duties.

lenders.name: MinhYen
lenders.loan_because: I beleive if one is willing to work hard for his/her family then he/she deserves a helping hand.

lenders.name: John & Rose
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully, in small ways, it can make a difference. And we like the idea of interest free loans to those working to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Got introduced to the idea of Kiva lending and finally found a way to give but knowing exactly where my donation would be used

lenders.name: Hana
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language.  Wanna learn / practice / communicate in a language?  Got to lang-8.com : ) (no, I'm not affiliated!)

lenders.name: Max and Emy
lenders.loan_because:
and it's only the giving

lenders.name: Mark Agwonah Memorial
lenders.loan_because:
This is a lending group in memory of Kiva borrower Mark Agwonah, who contributed greatly to his community and was tragically lost to the Kiva family on July 15th, 2007 under mysterious circumstances.

Mark Agwonah was 30 years old and an only son. He left behind his mother and two dependents, a boy and a girl, who are members of his extended family. The parents of one of the dependent died due to HIV/AIDS and the other dependent was abandoned during the 1992 land clashes in the Transmara region of Kenya. 

Mark was the founding member of a program called Youth Empowerment Centre. The Centre educates young men and women to help them start small businesses and also supports them with small loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a group of people from  www.kivafriends.org, who were shocked and outraged by what happened to Mark and want to ensure his legacy by making loans to Kenya. Mark has been an inspiring example for many and we do not want his legacy to fade.

The brutal death of a member of our community is a blow to all of us. If you want to join us, go to www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,682.0.html and post there. 

We also set up a fund to support Mark's mother, who is now solely responsible for the two children. If you want to know more, please go to:
www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,857.0.html

lenders.name: Josh (Yoshi)
lenders.loan_because:
After my trip to India during college - I gained a new understanding of the layers and depths of poverty that exist in our world.  And I also got to observe the loan distribution from a non-profit company connected to my university - and see the big difference a small amount of money can make.  How it can really change peoples lives in a significant way.

It's easy to forget all the things we are blessed with in our lives - and it is also very easy for me to get caught up in the hustle and bustle of my own life - that I can quickly forget how to stay connected or remember the importance of "making a difference" in our great global community.  Lending on Kiva is a small way I can still feel connected to "making a difference" in other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
August 2014

Thanks for the birthday wishes friends!  I took some of my birthday cash and passed it on through www.kiva.org / A $25 Loan to someone in need, that will be repaid to me - (and then I could lend out again) / Makes me feel good about how fortunate I am to celebrate my birthday with things in life that many in our world don't have.

lenders.name: WCE-INDIA
lenders.occupational_info:
Energy efficiency and clean, renewable energy will mean a stronger economy, a cleaner environment, and greater energy independence for any country. By investing in technology breakthroughs today, our nation can look forward to a more resilient economy and secure future. Far-reaching technology changes will be essential to India's energy future. Working with a wide array of state, community, industry, and grass root NGO partners, the WCE INDIA through Solar Energy For All (SEFA) project invests in a portfolio of energy technologies that will:

Conserve energy in the residential, commercial, industrial, government, and transportation sectors.
Increase and diversify energy supply, with a focus on renewable domestic sources.
Facilitate the emergence of solar technologies as vital new "energy carriers."
Upgrade India’s national energy infrastructure.

The Project aims to convert all existing electric power backup & hot water systems to solar power systems (electric, fuel or gas boosted) within 10 years and ensure all installations from 2010 are solar power & hot water systems. This is an ambitious goal and will require the commitment of several parties to achieve large-scale community behavioral change. The potential benefits facilitated by the Project are compelling and are detailed within the body of this report. The Project is unashamedly focused upon INDIA and has been designed to enable it to be replicated with other “green” products.

I also work part time as a projectionist at a historic movie theatre.  I've had this job for many years and my love of film keeps me there.

Finally, my true passion is jewelry making.  I have displays in local shops, attend the occasional craft/artisan show, and also have a little shop on Etsy.

lenders.loan_because: We are just trying to do what we can to spread the love that Jesus shows us.

lenders.name: FIU Microlenders
lenders.loan_because:
The FIU Micro Lenders, a new student organizing committee at Florida International University, as well as a non-profit 501c3 Florida corporation is committed to helping fight global poverty. Via mutually beneficial partnerships with local businesses, fund-raising efforts, and encouraging microfinance education for FIU's students they seek to provide tools for everyone to make their own contribution to a better world. 

We will continue to forge partnerships within our community, raise awareness of the powerful force of microfinance, and redefine what it means to be an International Business student.

For more information or to join your energies to our fight, please email us at:

fiumicrolenders@gmail.com
Second Kiva page at:
www.kiva.org/lender/fiumicrolenderscorp
lenders.occupational_info: We are International Business students enrolled at Florida International University.

lenders.name: Amresh
lenders.loan_because: I want  to start my own Export Business. I have 4 years experience in this field and I know I can do better in business and makes good profit.
lenders.occupational_info: It will basically an Export of Costume Jewellery form India to all other countries.

lenders.name: Charise-Warrior Princess
lenders.loan_because:
Charise is part of our family. She left this life on 7/31/07 after a valiant  effort to overcome a cancer challenge.

We are honored to contribute to the micro-loans of hard-working people - in memory of Charise, Warrior Princess.

lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I am working in a food pantry where we distribute food to the hungry in our area.  I also collect bread that would be tossed from the store and bring to the pantry.

lenders.name: The Wedge
lenders.loan_because: We are part of Church at The Ranch and are interested in joing an organization to lend loans to people in need.

We recently went on a missions trip to Mexico and have been wanting to lend a hand ever since! We feel this organization will help us give a little something to the world, and help those of us that are not as fortunate as ourselves.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have been poor, and now I am financially comfortable, not rich. I love being able to help women find a way to better themselves and their chidren.
